description: This source file is a Spring Boot REST controller named AccountController, providing API endpoints for retrieving bank and utility account details through HTTP GET requests.

classes.name: AccountController
classes.description: A Spring REST controller exposing endpoints for account retrieval operations, annotated with Swagger and Lombok for documentation and boilerplate reduction.

methods.name: getBankAccount
methods.description: Handles GET requests for retrieving bank account details by account number, logs the request, and delegates to AccountService.

methods.name: getUtilityAccount
methods.description: Handles GET requests for retrieving utility account details by account name, logs the request, and delegates to AccountService.
